website_summaries.verdict: Best value due to its low price plus durability and style. Enjoy the benefits of a carry-on and larger suitcase to fit all travel needs.
pros: Has interior mesh pockets for organization and hard case protects belongings
Warranty available as an add-on purchase
Colors make it easy to spot on luggage carousel
cons: The emblem logo is known to come off after repeated use

customer_reviews.title: This suitcase is amazing and has been cleared for all flights I have ...
customer_reviews.text: Wow! This suitcase is amazing and has been cleared for all flights I have been on. In the last six weeks I have flown delta, united, jet blue, southwest, and American and I have been able to use this as a carry on. The suitcase holds about 7-10 days worth of clothes, two pairs of shoes (sneakers and heels) and two comestic bags (one for toiletries and one for make-up)! Worth the buy!!
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Bourke

customer_reviews.title: cracked shell after two uses
customer_reviews.text: When this arrived I was shocked to see the color is much much brighter neon green than pictured. Ugly... but I got past it because I was in a rush and needed a suitcase. I used this suitcase twice and on the 3rd time I was at the airport and I saw it was sitting funny. took a closer look and turns out the shell of the suitcase was cracked. This should not be normal wear and tear after 2 times flying.
customer_reviews.author: CarrieB

customer_reviews.title: Looks good.  Smells terrible!!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this to use as a weekender local trip suitcase. It is cheaply made which I expected for the price. I cannot even express how bad it smells inside and out. Burning rubber is the closest I can come to describing the smell.I have used baking soda and Febreeze to no avail. I would never put my clothes in it! I should have trusted the reviews. I have been a loyal Amazon customer for years. WTH happened to quality control? Wish I could give no stars.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: This suitcase is nice to look at and seems great but after 1 ...
customer_reviews.text: This suitcase is nice to look at and seems great but after 1 trip in which we carried everything on the plane a piece fell off the side and exposed a sharp screw. My 6 year old scratched his leg and now I can't even get the company to return an email about fixing the problem. The warranty sucks and the company customer service is awful.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Edson

customer_reviews.title: Be Aware ....
customer_reviews.text: Nice color, and moves along well. Took on black skid marks when small plane required it be checked plane-side. A couple issues: while it fit well in the carry-on compartment during the first leg of my trip, it barely squeezed into place on my return. So be aware: this suitcase is fine, but doesn't/can't account for shrinking airline space. And for what it's worth: it really is useful, when placing a bag this size into the overhead, to have a grip handle on the base of the luggage; this has none. Awkward, but okay.
customer_reviews.author: AL

customer_reviews.title: this one is not meant for checked in baggage.
customer_reviews.text: I brought this product after going through the reviews that were posted at amazon. I had a very bad experience with this suitcase. I checked in this suitcase while travelling to east coast and when I collected this suit case I found it completely broken on the top. I'm extremely disappointed with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Xavier Dorairaj

customer_reviews.title: Zipper stitching needs some attention.
customer_reviews.text: The zipper stitching is only a single pass if it breaks anywhere the whole thing unravels. Really surprised not to see a backstitch every so often just to keep the entire zipper from coming off. I had to staple my carry on before I even used it once and it wasn't from over filling. Maybe just a one off bad one, because my full size has made 3 trips and is still good, but the zipper stitching on that is single pass also with no lock stitches.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: ... and for the first two trips it worked just fine. Now suddenly I cannot get the telescoping handle ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item and for the first two trips it worked just fine. Now suddenly I cannot get the telescoping handle to raise up any further than a few inches making it extremely difficult to maneuver. I would gladly discuss how to make this right if someone wants to contact me as I really was very excited about this suitcase.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy

customer_reviews.title: Used for 1 trip and broken
customer_reviews.text: Used for 1 trip only and the 24" size is broken on the bottom. Try to look for replacement on the parts but no one respond from Rockland.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry

customer_reviews.title: Great suitcase for the money!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great carry on suitcase. We recently traveled to three countries, and only brought carry on luggage. It's sturdy and handled well, especially as we almost missed a flight and had to run through the airport. It easily fits in the overhead bin, even when expanded. We stayed in seven hotels over 14 days, so we were constantly in and out of our luggage. My husband has the same brand suitcase in a different color, and it performed well also. I paid $50 for this and it was money well spent.
customer_reviews.author: CornfedContessa

customer_reviews.title: All of the black details like the handle and the stands etc are yellow
customer_reviews.text: ordered the blue one with the yellow zipper. Item is not as pictured, All of the black details like the handle and the stands etc are yellow, like a mustard collor instead of black as pictured. I was expecting a similar to the picture with the black details and the yellow zipper. I cant return since im on a different country... couldnt be more dissapointed. its not as pictured
customer_reviews.author: Najib

customer_reviews.title: Would like a refund
customer_reviews.text: This luggage only lasted one trip and a wheel fell off, so much for durability. It really impressed me how light and strong it was. However one wheel fell off prior to leaving for the airport, my husband tighten it. However another one came loose and was lost in the travelling. Would like a refund!
customer_reviews.author: Francie Escobar

customer_reviews.title: 3 stars might be generous
customer_reviews.text: I’m going to make this very short and to the point. I enjoyed this product at first; however, after basic usage the telescope handle is incredibly loose to the point it’s not safe to use it. I’ve now had to carry it from the side handle. In other words, I can no longer use this comfortably. This case also, scratches incredibly easily, which I’m not particularly thrilled about. I want to rate this down more, because I’m not happy with this product, but thought I should be generous.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn

customer_reviews.title: I loved this luggage
customer_reviews.text: I loved this luggage! Took this on 12 flights all over South America and it held up amazingly! It was easy to maneuver in the airports and came through without any damage. We're even buying a second set now.
customer_reviews.author: AmyB87

customer_reviews.title: A ton of room, even for a week-long trip. I don't like checking luggage, this is perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This piece of hard shell luggage is going to be perfect. It looks like the right size and extremely durable! Excellent purchase. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Valerie

customer_reviews.title: Spend a few dollars more on a different/similar product!
customer_reviews.text: This suitcase.... 🙄 the zipper tore on the first trip I took it on, leaving an open gap on one corner. I returned the product and will buy something similar but (hopefully) better! Having looked through similar products on amazon, there are better options for $5ish more that are lighter, contain more internal storage (zippers, pockets, etc.,) and still have the protective shell and convenient wheels.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Navy and yellow case doesn't hold up
customer_reviews.text: I bought the navy and yellow case two years ago - but we are only occasional travellers, so it has only been on 3 trips in that time. On the third trip, while walking between terminals, the handle suddenly came apart. So there I was, with a long multi-leg voyage still to go, and a suitcase that not only couldn't be wheeled any longer, but had a sharp metal rod sticking out of it that wouldn't retract. Even though the descriptions states there is a 5 year warranty, there's no information about how to claim against it - and reviews leave me doubtful that there's anything to gain by trying.
customer_reviews.author: Urshigan

customer_reviews.title: 20" carry on dimensions listed aren't accurate
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love this luggage. I was skeptical after reading some reviews on the overall dimensions of the 20" carry on but decided to order it and see for myself. We're traveling to Italy and I'm told the airlines are more strict on the size restrictions and the luggage I received measured 22 1/2" H x 16" W x 9 1/4" D with the handles and wheels and not the 20" H X13" W x10" D as advertised. I have returned this luggage so I can not comment on how well it holds up.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole St. Clair

customer_reviews.title: Great luggage!
customer_reviews.text: We have bought one of this for almost everyone in our family! We love this luggage. It's light and easy to move around. We love having four wheels, it's much easier to move and requires less effort. We had another pair of these luggage for already 3 years and have done a lot of traveling with it in the USA and internationally. We haven't had any issue and the structure is perfect, no damage despite all the airport moving around, etc. All wheels still intact. The colors are great, because it's easy to identify in the airport carrousel. Highly recommend this brand and model.
customer_reviews.author: Tamara Solorzano

customer_reviews.title: These 2 pieces of luggage are great. Not only is the set great for the ...
customer_reviews.text: These 2 pieces of luggage are great. Not only is the set great for the price, but they are very sturdy and reliable pieces. I would know, I filled both to their capacity. I bought them in the color Champagne, the color was beautiful and very easy to spot on the conveyer belt. I prefer suitcases that have wheels that go in all directions and these do just that. I travel a lot, back and forth to school and I'm an over-packer, so take it from me...this luggage is great.
customer_reviews.author: Bre

customer_reviews.title: $40 For Warranty Service - About The Cost of a New Suitcase
customer_reviews.text: I owned this carry on for less than two years. I used it about four times. Last month I took a flight and the bag lost one of its wheels. I went onto the website to see about warranty service and, to my dismay, while there is a 5 year "warranty," it will cost you $40 to file a warranty claim - which is essentially the cost of a new suitcase. So, really, the bags are low quality and the warranty is more of an illusion than anything. You can buy a new bag or pay $40 for the "warranty" to replace it - it leads to the same result.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Fan

customer_reviews.title: Flexibible
customer_reviews.text: Did a Vegas trio and didn't want to do a bag anymore. Saw this looked affordable and I loved the wheels move all the way around not just front and back. Here’s what I packed in it for 4 days in Vegas: Walking fashion shoes, tennis shoes, sandals, bathing suit, gym shirt & shorts, 4 pair of socks, 2 bras, 6 undies, pajama pants & the top, 4 going out nice tops, 3 t-shirts, pair of jeans, 2 Capri jeans, 2 jean shorts Small Perfume and some fashion jewelry in the zipper little bag. Yes, I over pack because you never know! And all this fit fine! Loved it! Could probably add a little more if needed.
customer_reviews.author: alma

customer_reviews.title: Otherwise it's great sturdy and durable luggage and the 4 wheels are ...
customer_reviews.text: My main complaint about this luggage is that unlike my previous soft shell luggage, this zips and opens/closes right down the middle. So your stuff on either side kind of gets jostled around when you are closing it. My previous luggage had one deep side and I prefer that. I should've paid more attention when I purchased, my fault. Otherwise it's great sturdy and durable luggage and the 4 wheels are the best!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel S

customer_reviews.title: Worst Warranty
customer_reviews.text: Well it has a 5 year warranty. Has anyone read the warranty? I send the luggage to them at my expense, along with $40.00 and they will repair or replace at their option. Well it's a cheap piece of luggage. I got two pieces for less than $100. So by the time I send the luggage back, and pay them for their cheap luggage, AGAIN, I've lost money. Please save your money and upgrade of you can. The luggage, when it was new, worked fine. It held my stuff and rolled fairly well. So they get a star for holding luggage. But I kind of think their warranty is a fraud.
customer_reviews.author: J. Barker

customer_reviews.title: Horribly made. Used this 3 piece luggage for one ...
customer_reviews.text: Horribly made. Used this 3 piece luggage for one trip and the small and large sized suitcases broke. Two stoppers from the large suitcase broke off and three stoppers on the small suitcase broke off. The large suitcase also has a huge crack. I know the people at the airport really don't care how they throw your luggage onto the turning belts, but these suit cases should have a much stronger durability for travel. Made cheap in my opinion. Not worth the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Piece of junk
customer_reviews.text: Worst luggage set ever do not buy, I bought these last year didn’t travel with them until recently, the first time I used the big one the wheel broke, I thought it was just handled rough through the cruise line I went on, then I used the small one maybe four times and the wheel broke, I’m traveling internationally so I kinda just had to keep using it and all the wheels are broke it’s cheaply made the outer shell cracked in several places. This luggage SUCKS don not buy it unless you only want to use it a couple of times
customer_reviews.author: AmyRozay

customer_reviews.title: Believe the hype
customer_reviews.text: This sucker bats up there with luggage twice the price. Just survived a trip that saw 2 other pieces of luggage dented and damaged, this one came out with a few minor scuffs. Probably one of the top spinners we've had. Our kids were able to easily 1-hand this around the airport without issue. Construction is sturdy, expandable design is great for when you are not confined by carry-on size rules. We'll be adding another one of these to replace one of the above damaged suitcases in the near future. I know a few other reviews have complained about size, this orange one was spot on to posted measurements.
customer_reviews.author: John H.

customer_reviews.title: Item described inaccurately (or broken in transit)
customer_reviews.text: Bought this item "pretty new" on Black Friday at a decent price. It arrived in a worn package with broken handle. Clearly worse than just a little cosmetic damage. If it was broken, the description was inaccurate. If it broke during transit then the luggage's durability is terrible. Either way this was a bad experience. What was supposed to be a great deal has turned into an inconvenience.
customer_reviews.author: Titus Smith

customer_reviews.title: Terrible suitcase .
customer_reviews.text: Your.of the box , this luggage was a disaster right out of the box . The box was dropped or something , but when I opened the package (which is not secured inside) one of the wheels was split from the base of the luggage . This tells you how cheap is this luggage , they should not advertise this suitcase as $120.00 . I should've know the reason why this suitcase was 42.99 . Don't buy it . I never had anything happen to my other suitcases . Beware
customer_reviews.author: Eli

customer_reviews.title: Disappointment
customer_reviews.text: A wheel broke off after 4 trips and the luggage was 6 months old. There is no warranty to speak of so the thing is sitting by the curb. I’m going back to Samsonite.
customer_reviews.author: Gordon

customer_reviews.title: beautiful color. I'm on ging on a trip later ...
customer_reviews.text: beautiful color. I'm on ging on a trip later but here are the pics I have so far! Love the color of this luggage! Pretty champagne color. looks better in life. spacious and easy to roll. there are 2 pieces. both you can roll!
customer_reviews.author: Camshopz

customer_reviews.title: Wheel came off
customer_reviews.text: Purchased in July 2017 and used less than 4 times. This last trip the wheel completely came off. See pictures. Luckily my husband travels with duct tape (he’s like Macgyver!) and was able to patch the hole up so we could use it back home. Not worth it, save your money.
customer_reviews.author: Mefaith

customer_reviews.title: CHEAP FEELING WIGGLY HANDLE: silver parts feel like cheap plastic
customer_reviews.text: Pretty disappointed, and confused why Rockland has so many five star reviews? The body of the suitcase feels good, but the silver parts feel like like a really cheap plastic. The handle is very loose and flimsy, maybe I got a defective one..? Don't think so. I don't think this will hold up through an airport. We will see I guess **update** I just took the protective layer off and the green line is way uneven and crooked. See pictures. These are crap unless mine is defective, but I don't think it is
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Broke before we got on the airplane! AWFUL
customer_reviews.text: AWFUL! I ordered a suitcase for my son for a month long trip to Rome. At the airport, after we showed our boarding place to the airline attendant and before we boarded the plane, the handle broke irreparably. It was an absolutely awful way to start our trip and we had to take an hour to get a new suitcase when we arrived in Italy. And because of the limitations of time, we ended up having to get a new suitcase at 3 times the price last minute. Nightmare, AVOID!
customer_reviews.author: Becca

customer_reviews.title: Came covered in filth
customer_reviews.text: The suitcase itself is alright. Cute color. But it came covered in some kind of thick black grease-like material that I was only able to remove with an oil-based makeup remover. I don't have enough time to send this back before my trip in two days so I may consider keeping it. But this is just downright unacceptable. I could have very easily spent my money elsewhere. Don't bother. Quality control is horrible.
customer_reviews.author: Charo

customer_reviews.title: Wears out quickly
customer_reviews.text: Loved this suitcase, but wore out nearly 4 months after I had it. Would order again, but the wheel literally fell apart after I had a longer than normal trek to the train station.
customer_reviews.author: Janelle N.

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY Ripped day 1 - incredibly disappointed; 1 month later UNUSABLE
customer_reviews.text: Very cute and lightweight suitcase. Moves 360 degrees very well. HOWEVER the inner lining ripped the FIRST time I used it. I’m very very disappointed. seems that the cloth portions were constructed very poorly - it ripped all along the seam making the flap between the suitcase sides unusable. Update 1 month of use: Now the zippers have become unthreaded and unworkable. DO NOT BUY THIS BAG. Terrible quality. Complete waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: T Man

customer_reviews.title: Broken Handle On First Use
customer_reviews.text: The carry on bag handle broke on first use. This was bought and used by my 12 year old daughter and it barely had anything in it and broke under its own weight. The boss for the screw and thread engagement is insufficient. In the picture the screw is still exposed where it came out of the handle. What can't be seen in the picture is the case itself is separating where the handle should be secured, which indicates the case material is too thin. I'm disappointed I let me daughter down, but will return it asap and get luggage with handles that are properly designed/secured.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: fails on FIRST trip
customer_reviews.text: Highly suspect of the reviews which say it is durable. Very first trip it had 7 dark stains but the unacceptable problem was a hole about 1/3 of an inch in diameter. Incredibly weak/thin exterior material. Maybe if you were only going to use it in the trunk of your car it might last, but if you have to either check it plane side or in the terminal, getting a hole in the first use is way too flimsy. I checked it plane side and only got one trip out of it. It's not worth the $49.
customer_reviews.author: John G.

customer_reviews.title: Good and durable
customer_reviews.text: This worked out great for my son when we went to Florida. He kept playing with it in the house before we left, racing it all over the place. The wheels are great and very maneuverable. It held up to being knocked around a few times. I found a similar carry-on for my daughter at Tuesday Morning for only $40 and it was made by Swiss Gear. Same great wheels and space, but the zippers inside hers was slightly BETTER quality. So, it's only made it through one big trip, but it did it with flying colors. The only downside of these hard case carry-ons is not having any pockets on the outside.
customer_reviews.author: N. A. Carr

customer_reviews.title: Keep breaking
customer_reviews.text: Two Rockland suitcases from Amazon have fallen apart. One in Navy with a yellow zipper and one in Red. After one flight, a wheel on the the red suitcase broke off. What?! Then the other suitcase's yellow zipper broke. These suitcases are a good price, but not if I'm buying a new suitcase every one or two flights. Grr.
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: Not the color I expected!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome piece of luggage. It is just the right size for a carry on, great quality, and seems to be able to hold quite a but of stuff. My two problems with it are that it doesn't have any outside pockets, just the main big area in the middle. It is also not even close to the color I expected. The picture makes it look like a minty green, and I got NEON green. I will have to get used to such a bright color!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Did the job for me!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this luggage for a trip to Europe a few months back and it did not disappoint! It held my clothes and personal items successfully, as well as a couple souvenirs I purchased while traveling. It also stood the test of being rolled on the cobblestone streets of Amsterdam w/o the wheels falling off or showing any major signs of wear and tear. Overall for the price, this luggage in my opinion, is well worth the buy! I did purchase the insurance when buying this suitcase for a small fee just in case it did not withstand my trip overseas, but thankfully, it did and I’m so glad I bought it! Good job, Rockland!
customer_reviews.author: Yvette

customer_reviews.title: WORTH THE MONEY A YEAR LATER
customer_reviews.text: I have had this for over a year now. It has traveled with me several times through LAX. Still looks great! It fits SO MUCH! Great size for a great price. The wheels really make this suitcase easy to take around crowded airports, and its small enough to fit in the overhead bin. I've also had it checked, and it didn't have any issues upon arrival.
customer_reviews.author: kiggidykayla

customer_reviews.title: Save your money — buy something else
customer_reviews.text: Terrible product. Used the carryon 5 times over the last year and the case cracked near each of the wheels during the first use. Now it’s at a point where I can’t even use it because it doesn’t roll correctly. Save your money and buy a nice suitcase because even though this has a “warranty”, it’s not even worth it because you have to pay to ship it back and pay a $40 processing fee.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just didn't last....
customer_reviews.text: I bought this suitcase in August 2016 and LOVED it for the first 2.5 years owning it. I am a seldom traveler and probably used the suitcase no more than 10 times for domestic travel only..... the last 2 times using it, the wheels were acting up - the last time, one wheel completely unraveled and rendered it useless. Everything else about the case is wonderful.... just wish the wheels actually lasted more than 10 trips.
customer_reviews.author: LBoog112

customer_reviews.title: Handle broke the first time I used it! So disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like this suitcase set. It has plenty of space, feels sturdy, is very maneuverable and cute as hell. But the retractable handle on the larger case broke the first time I used it, right at the beginning of a 2 week trip for work which is pretty hugely inconvenient. I'm very frustrated since I waited too long to use it and now it's too late to return. So, thanks for leaving me stranded Rockland. I will not be purchasing your deceptively stylish cases again.
customer_reviews.author: Nye W Blades

customer_reviews.title: Perfect little carry on
customer_reviews.text: I bought three bags for my three boys. These really are fantastic bags my only problem is that the red one has bubblegum pink inside. You can tell by the picture that the middle one is slightly different in the handle but other than that they’re all pretty identical. They arrived in perfect condition with a little padlock that lets you set your own combination. I definitely recommend these bags! And I can’t wait to use them! (even though I will probably return the red one for the turquoise)
customer_reviews.author: BonRae

customer_reviews.title: Second set
customer_reviews.text: Bought an orange set last year for my oldest, these are for my middle daughter. We traveled with the set last year and loved them. Can’t wait to have them for the whole family. Priced great, 2 for what you pay for one in all the department stores. I bought the 4 year insurance plan, still under $90. We only travel a few times a year, so can’t speak to frequent traveling needs. But for the occasional traveler wanting hard luggage with 360 wheels these are a great option.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Broke on first trip.
customer_reviews.text: I flew from Minnesota to Hawaii in October and I bought this set just before the trip. The carry-on worked great, but the larger unit came off the carousel missing a wheel. I had concerns about it's durability because it was so light for its size, but for a check-in that size you might want to look for a build that has heavier construction.
customer_reviews.author: nathan jacobs

customer_reviews.title: Love this bag!
customer_reviews.text: I agonized over reviews on several roller carry-ons before choosing this one. I am SO glad I decided to buy this! It was the perfect size for my carry-on (Delta) and was so easy to manuever! It fit perfectly and easily in the overhead storage. There is plenty of room inside, and the outside is sturdy. I was able to slide my personal bag over the handle without an issue, and it made for a perfect experience! I saw some review about a funny smell. The luggage smelled new- that's all - certainly not an issue at all. I am looking into purchasing other pieces to match my new, fun bag!
customer_reviews.author: Sandi

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this luggage!
customer_reviews.text: Great sturdy little luggage! We were looking for something that would fit for our trip to Italy. We wanted to only take carry on luggage and these worked for all of our planes and trains! The wheels held up through all of the Italian cobble stone roads and it is still in one piece!
customer_reviews.author: Solar521

customer_reviews.title: Great Suitcase But Plastic Covering A Problem!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice suitcase! Nice size! Lightweight! The only thing I would complain about is removing the plastic from the suitcase. Once you remove it, the suitcase looks even more beautiful and shiny BUT pieces of plastic are left remaining around the label that's on the suitcase and the handle and it totally takes away from the polished look of the suitcase. Hopefully I can remove the remaining pieces with a tweezer or something but who wants to do that with a new suitcase?! Other than that, the suitcase is perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Junne Olmo

customer_reviews.title: Should be great when travel is allowed again...
customer_reviews.text: All dressed up & no where to go. Great little suitcase I purchased in various colors for my children to easily maneuver on their own through the airport on vacation. Seems like it’ll do the trick and should fit in the overhead bin. Thanks Covid ruining that trip so I’ll have to get back to ya as to just how well they actually work. Lightweight, solid little case.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Easy Rider
customer_reviews.text: My old luggage broke during a trip and I needed replacement luggage fast for upcoming trips. I was pleasantly surprised at how easily the wheels glides and how light weight these bags are. My old luggage was not user-friendly, I just didn't know it til I got these bags. I love the being able to pack clothes on both sides of the bag and separate them with using the zippered compartment. The both luggages are deceptively spacious. I was able to fit a clothes, shoes, two heavy coats, sweaters and toiletries and still have space.
customer_reviews.author: almira

customer_reviews.title: Nice suitcases!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a green one for my 2 year old and a pink one for my 6 year old for Christmas. So far we really like them! We travel to visit family a lot and go on little vacations a few times a year. We’ve already used them once and they easily held enough clothes for my kids for a week. The pink one had a small tear in the fabric but I didn’t want to mess with exchanging as it wasn’t a huge deal. Really hoping these hold up and we can use them for a long while, so far so good!
customer_reviews.author: Brooklyn

customer_reviews.title: Stay away. Not sure why the high reviews.
customer_reviews.text: Terrible product. Took it on one trip as a carry on and it fell apart and the zipper came loose. The quality is absolutely subpar. If they are selling it for more than $20, then it is not worth it at all. Spend a little more and get a real product that will last. My previous bag has lasted more than 10 years and it is in better shape than this bag is in after ONE use. Unacceptable.
customer_reviews.author: Owner

customer_reviews.title: Held a lot and rolled great in hotels
customer_reviews.text: I love these suitcases. We used these for our week trip and it held so much! The expandable detail lets you add so much. It’s such a plus. They roll with easy. I haven’t put it on an airplane so I cannot attest to the holdup of it going on an aircraft baggage claim track. But in and out of cars and hotels did very well!
customer_reviews.author: Blank

customer_reviews.title: Decent product for the price. Note it’s not hard shell.
customer_reviews.text: Dents easily. But pretty decent product for the price. Has good wheels and rolling. Each piece fits inside the other perfectly to stow away compactly. Each one has straps inside and a zipper to hold everything on one side. It’s a firm shell not a hard shell. If I had to buy again I would buy a hard shell product.
customer_reviews.author: Shari L Lew

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied
customer_reviews.text: We bought the 3 piece grey/orange color set and an extra carry on! 5 flights, 50 hours of train travel, 7 airports, and about 2 miles of walking on concrete, and this luggage was GREAT! No damage, just a little dirt on the 24 inch piece! Well worth the price and would definitely buy again! The grey/orange was easy to spot in the airports so buy a different color!-)))
customer_reviews.author: B Bear

customer_reviews.title: Perfect. I already recommended to our parents.
customer_reviews.text: My hubby and I went to china for 10 days and only took 1 carry on each. We chose this brand in the teal and the red colors. It traveled perfectly and fit Amazon basics and bagail brand packing cubes great. I was concerned about how the inside fabric zipper would hold up because I packed mine really tight but it did amazing! I loved that these came with their own locks too, nice bonus! Perfect rollability 360 degrees Compressed so well, didn't even have to use the expandable zipper for 10 day trip. Very Affordable. 50.00 is best price for this quality I could find.
customer_reviews.author: Not that Alexa

customer_reviews.title: You Get What You Pay For
customer_reviews.text: I guess the saying "you get what you pay for" applies here. The first trip I took using this luggage set, both pieces were scuffed - to the depth of the ribbing. Nothing was damaged inside; however, this was just a one-way, in country flight. I'm concerned how my luggage is going to fair as I continue my travels. I travel by air on the low end, 20+ times a year. Not that $100-ish is anything to sneeze at, but it really is on the low end of the cost of two pieces of luggage. I'll do my research and get a sturdier set once these pieces are beaten up.
customer_reviews.author: sherry goodloe

customer_reviews.title: Film to protect the bag does not fully come off
customer_reviews.text: I bought this suitcase in the quilt design because it looks so cute. However, case comes with a film over most of it and 1). It must have been a returned item. Someone tried to remove some of the film and scratched it. Thought I would live with it. 2). The film is super hard to remove and doesn't come off at all the hard connected parts (near handle, wheels, emblem, etc.). Just terrible and looks awful! Unfortunately, I waited too long to return this item in the allotted time (waited to take it out just before my scheduled trip). Very disappointed!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Fireflower

customer_reviews.title: Broke first use; not well made
customer_reviews.text: UGH! A wheel broke off the large Rockland case the very first time I used it. The break revealed really poor construction: three very tiny screws appear to be all that held the wheel on, and the mount area is not reinforced. I can't blame the break on handling with such lousy construction. Bolts would have been better. A bumper strip broke off as well. See photos.
customer_reviews.author: MsBrola

customer_reviews.title: Overall this looks like a good piece of luggage
customer_reviews.text: Just arrived yesterday. Unfortunately I won't be using this til December but I couldn't pass up the price even though it is HOT pink. Overall this looks like a good piece of luggage. Will work perfect for a week or less trip. It is very lightweight. I'm hoping it holds up as I have to use it as a checked bag. The outside is sort of hard - You can push on the shell and move it. The wheels do rotate 360. It comes with a 5 year warranty but you have to pay $40 bucks to get it repaired which is more than I paid for it so that does no good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Choose something else.
customer_reviews.text: Largest suitcase broke on the first trip. I was taking an international flight and it was broken at my last US stop. I had to tape it shut with the help of customer service. All the pieces smelled as well. I sprayed them with vinegar and left them outside to no avail. Additionally, a year later I pulled the middle one out for another trip and it still smelled. I've left them in the attic for the last 2 years. Now they barely smell.
customer_reviews.author: Justifer

customer_reviews.title: This is NOT polycarbonate!  Fraudulent description
customer_reviews.text: The description states "polycarbonate." This is untrue. It is clearly a lesser material like pvc or abs. It is super light and cheap if that is what you want.
customer_reviews.author: Wei C. Wong

customer_reviews.title: Cheap quality, flimsy
customer_reviews.text: Arrived dented. If it didn't survive the mail, my expectations for actual travel are low. Also arrived with the liner ripped. Not at all what I was expecting. The only thing I like is the color scheme. Everything else about this product is trash. I definitely don't recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Dylan

customer_reviews.title: NOT a durable long lasting product
customer_reviews.text: At first I really liked this luggage but on about my 4th trip the wheel shredded mid vacation. Low and behold after looking at the manufacturer images and product description here, and the provided customer images there seems to be no consistency with which wheels are used, except to say they appear to never be the clear skate wheels listed in the description. I would have happily just replaced the wheel but the design makes that impossible sadly. If you are looking for a very affordable set of luggage to get you through light travel this may do, but this luggage is not durable or long lasting by any means.
customer_reviews.author: Nemo

customer_reviews.title: Not bad but a few flaws
customer_reviews.text: I love that it’s easy to find among all other luggage. Extremely light and a hard shell but somewhat flex. It expands too but a couple things went wrong already. The interior belt clasp doesn’t clasp and never did. We don’t use those anyway but I was hoping that want the start of it falling apart before we even used it! The other was the handle going up & down is a bit wonky and doesn’t always stay up when using it. Handles are pretty flimsy. BUT after all that we still love them & glad we purchased them. We got the green & blue & they look just like the pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Cathib

customer_reviews.title: Great deal super strong
customer_reviews.text: These things are amazing. I bought my wife and I a set for Christmas. We had broken old luggage in the past (3 times to be exact) and have had to haul it around on vacation. This luggage seems to be very strong. The wheels also roll well and I don’t think they will break easily. I also like the color options as it is easy to spot my luggage at the airport carousel. They also have a zip up splitter so it feels like each suitcase is 2.
customer_reviews.author: Erik Vanden Avond

customer_reviews.title: Nice suitcase so far
customer_reviews.text: We bought this suitcase for our grand niece who is turning 5. She LOVED the colors. It is a little thick but she's still able to maneuver it. They will be traveling with it in September and we'll see how durable it is. Seems to be mixed results in other reviews. We could have gotten her a much less expensive suitcase at a big box stores but wanted to get her something nicer. Time will tell if this was a good purchase. Right now I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: SoTXBear

customer_reviews.title: Great suitcases but buy your own locks!
customer_reviews.text: The suitcases are great and easily fit into each other for storage and quite scratch resistant. Problem encountered was with the TSA locks that might be faulty as they seem to scramble or jam the combination. I use the same 3-digit codes for ease of recall. First time one wouldn’t unlock, it took days of trying before it opened with one digit change by one number! Second time the lock jammed, and changing the digits by one didn’t help. In the process, the zipper got damaged, and the claim process proved too onerous. Have always loved Rockland suitcases but will in future buy my own TSA Locks.
customer_reviews.author: VioAnne

customer_reviews.title: Happy and blessed five year old!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this stylish, lightweight luggage (carry on for my son and my husband the larger size) for my five year old son. He was delighted and absolutely loved the bold color. However, my husband kept warning him that it most likely would get damaged after passing through baggage claim. He warned him that it may come around the conveyor belt with a missing wheel or seriously scratched up. Fortunately, it survived. It did have a marking or two but for the most part it definitely held up. Great workmanship and very spacious. He enjoyed packing and unpacking his clothes. Carry on is perfect for your average 3-11 year old child.
customer_reviews.author: Blessedmomof3

customer_reviews.title: Great bag
customer_reviews.text: Great bag for the money! Wheels are a little stiff, and could role a little easier. Over all very pleased with this bag!
customer_reviews.author: Jen Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Love these suitcases!
customer_reviews.text: This luggage is sooooo cute! I got the pink color and the color is true to the picture. It has an adorable light pink with white polka dot lining. Each suit case has a zip compartment in the lid to separate the sides, this is great if you’re sharing a suitcase with someone else for traveling. I’m going on vacation with my boyfriend and we’re able to share by putting his close in one side and mine in the other without having them mix together in transit. These were such a great price and everything I was looking for. I will update my review after I fly with them and can review their functional value.
customer_reviews.author: AC

customer_reviews.title: A great buy
customer_reviews.text: Ok so when I first bought this luggage I thought it might be too small but only needed clothes for two days so I bought it because the price was right. When I realized how much packing room there is I became obsessed with trying to pack it to the max. I really amazes me how much I can pack. It is such a good bag and then bought a bag for my husband who like me is amazed how much you can get into the bag. My husband can also pack for a week and he is really no small man. Think this is one item I can't be without.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Palazzolo

customer_reviews.title: Easy to find
customer_reviews.text: I have not been able to take a business trip yet because of the current crisis but I took the bag out of the box and brought some stuff home from work in it and it seems to work fine. It’s a great color orange and I know I’ll be able to find it on the belt at the airport since everybody else has black luggage. The next time I travel I will update this and let you know what happens so stay tuned :-) I just hope should be back on the road soon
customer_reviews.author: Keith

customer_reviews.title: This carryon is a GAMECHANGER
customer_reviews.text: After my last carryon I had for 10 years with only 2 back wheels suddenly decided to not cooperate and move on to luggage heaven and busted while I was in between flights I got my first 4 wheel carryon and THIS IS A GAMECHANGER. fits in all the overhead compartments, wheels through airports and lines with ease, I would definitely recommend since I travel a lot! I got the purple one which stands out from the basic black. Great carryon
customer_reviews.author: iamsamsam

customer_reviews.title: So far so good...
customer_reviews.text: These are lightweight, and *feel* lightweight... They definitely don't feel like my old hardcase Samsonite suitcases, which wear like a tank, but are unfortunately too heavy for most transatlantic flights these days... I saw some reviews that complained about damage on the first trip. I've now flown with them several times, and dragged them around on rough ground, and they are holding up so far.
customer_reviews.author: Theory Grrl

customer_reviews.title: Loved it... but didn’t hold up
customer_reviews.text: I really loved this set. It’s huge and I Never have to worry I won’t have room for all the things I need. Packed tight I’d hit 49 pounds perfect! I bought for a cruise last December. Took a trip to Utah in feb and just came back from Vegas. Upon claiming my luggage at the delta terminal the wheel was nearly ripped off. I’m so disappointed. I am heading to Hawaii and need to buy new luggage now less than a year after purchasing this set
customer_reviews.author: Carrie Lorentz

customer_reviews.title: great "not so little" suitcase!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little suitcase for carry on luggage. I recently flew to NYC and wanted a smaller suitcase that met the airlines size requirements. This case fit EVERYTHING I needed and had room to spare. It was lightweight yet very durable, easy to maneuver and I could even roll it down the aisle of the Alaska airplane. I am very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: KBF

customer_reviews.title: Awful quality, DO NOT BUY. Also warranty is a scam
customer_reviews.text: DON’T BUY This suitcase is horrible quality. I’ve now owned two, both of them broke in only a handful of uses. The second time I purchased I bought the warranty...TOTAL SCAM! It has been a second job trying to get them to take action. Finally they said they would replace by broken suitcase if I paid $20 shipping (on a $30 suitcase + $ warranty). What are they thinking?!?! highly recommend you stay far far away from this suitcase and luggage company
customer_reviews.author: ML

customer_reviews.title: I would like a refund - but that button is gone and ...
customer_reviews.text: I just took my first flight with this bag, it was never checked and the handle snapped off. I am very upset with this purchase! I can't believe this happened on a bag I spent just shy of $50 on. I would like a refund - but that button is gone and it's no longer eligible.
customer_reviews.author: Autumn

customer_reviews.title: ... options before settling on this one and I'm so glad that I did
customer_reviews.text: I spent a long time looking at several options before settling on this one and I'm so glad that I did! The color is even brighter in person and the inside has zippers so you can utilize both sides of the case. plus there's an extra inner zipper for chargers or whatever!
customer_reviews.author: Jenny Lee

customer_reviews.title: Great Value, decent quality..I've purchased two and am very satisfied.
customer_reviews.text: Great little suitcase that rolls upright like a champ. No problem at all with size as a carry-on either. Very nicely finished both inside and out with details like a zippered cover for one side and holding straps on the other that make it much easier to close. It looks very nice too. Outstanding value for the price. I'm not sure why anyone would spend three or four times the price for an alternative. I've purchased two and am very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: La Piniac

customer_reviews.title: YELLOW!  SPINS!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these suitcases for a trip. Due to a cruel twist of fate, all travel is suspended? So I sit and twirl them round and round! They sure brighten up my day! LOL! But seriously, they are pretty, seem sturdy, good price! Always good to have a suitcase that is easy to see ? With my luck, I will see it fall off the the tall luggage thing at the airport, and get run over by another machine, and my undies will blowing all over the airport! LOL! If you like yellow? Go for it!
customer_reviews.author: PIlar

customer_reviews.title: Can't Beat the Price
customer_reviews.text: We bought four of these and some smelled more than others, but they all eventually aired out. After dragging them all around Europe one summer and on many trips since then one wheel did break on one of them, but for the price I can't complain. We bought another.
customer_reviews.author: Todd Scott

customer_reviews.title: Better options out there
customer_reviews.text: The handle was defective upon arrival (didnt extend all the way) so i’m sending it back. I was looking for the largest carry on i could find. This held a bit more than the Amazon basics 20” hardshell spinner but the quality was less in just about every way (zippers, wheels and overall sturdiness). This also had a chemical smell which the Amazon did not. This was lighter than the Amazon bag and seemed more prone to tipping over.
customer_reviews.author: MM

customer_reviews.title: Love this suitcase !
customer_reviews.text: I have had this suitcase for 2+ years (I also bought my husband one). We have traveled near and far on many trips...some local and some as far as Europe. I have used this as my sole suitcase for a 2 week trip to Europe and fit everything. It has held up and I have definitely gotten my money’s worth. I recommend this suitcase to everyone bc I love it. If it wears out at this point, I’ve gotten my money’s worth and wouldn’t mind purchasing a new one. But as of now, it’s still rollin’!
customer_reviews.author: Fruits

customer_reviews.title: Love this suitcase
customer_reviews.text: Love this suitcase! Had a previous set from Rockland but they were not spinners. I decided to upgrade after a tedious baggage experience on my last cruise. I was so jealous of everyone on the ship and in the airport that had spinners! I purchased this and then went to VEGAS...It was wheeled through 2 airports and 4 different planes and even fit in the over head bins on American Airlines. I haven't had any issues with the wheels or the suitcase at all. LOVE this thing! And it's so pretty!! Will be getting an entire set in the future!
customer_reviews.author: Meghan

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this carry on last year, but we only it 3 times. Check out the photos how bad quality it is. First time we use it we were so happy because it was so light and with 4 wheels, easy to roll but the second time we use it, the handle was broken; and after the third time we use it to Europe. Now it is retired now unfortunately. It says 2 years warranty but it needs to pay $40 to use the warranty but we bought it with $35 dollars only. Don’t recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Xuer

customer_reviews.title: smell is toxic
customer_reviews.text: this set if beautiful and arrived extremely fast however, the smell is ridiculous!! seriously I do not get bothered by much with 5 kids, but as soon as this was opened, my house filled with the odor. When my kids got home from school the first thing they asked was "what is that smell?!" I have sprayed febreeze multiple times, used sanitizing clothes and left them outside to air out for 2 days... they still smell as strong as when they arrived. I wish I knew how to get rid of it. I'm afraid my clothes will smell like that when I travel.
customer_reviews.author: clossonmom

customer_reviews.title: Wow. Nice luggage.
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and low price. Bought for my young son who loves orange and wanted a new bag for our travels. We both love it. The orange is a true traffic cone orange and there is a ton of room inside (the collapsible handle has its own compartment outside the internal luggage area). Don't know how it will hold up to typical travel wear and tear, but seems pretty well made for that. I travel a lot and I think I may get one of these for myself.
customer_reviews.author: K.S. in WA

customer_reviews.title: Poor workmanship
customer_reviews.text: The stitching connecting zipper to the suitcase started to unravel. I was already at airport so i had to purchase a luggage strap to keep suitcase closed. I contacted company have not heard back so i contacted again but am leaving bad review and recommending ypu not purchase this brand. I ended up fixing myself. Since never heard back from amazon or company Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Nee

customer_reviews.title: Love the Color
customer_reviews.text: First off, I love the color. The bright teal made it easy to spot on the baggage carousel. While this suitcase does meet standard requirements for carry on luggage I was on a smaller plane so it still had to be checked (free of charge). Otherwise, it wheeled well, the handle went up and down with ease, and had plenty of space for my over packing tendency.
customer_reviews.author: Bri

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Great suitcase set. I quit purchasing expensive luggage a decade ago due to my business travel schedule and the ware they endure. This set works great, although not as study as some expensive luggage, but easy to wheel through an airport. Holds up quite well. No issues and you can't beat the price. I bought the brown set and it coordinates well with my LV carry ons and briefcase.
customer_reviews.author: LargeEventPlanner

customer_reviews.title: Cute but beware of that stupid sticker!
customer_reviews.text: Used this for the first time traveling internationaly. Held up great and was able to pack for 8 days, including heavier clothing for cooler weather. The reason for only 3 stars is the stupid sticker they put on the outside indicating the lightweight design left a sticky residue that I cannot remove. So now my funky cute green suitcase has a dirty circle where that sticker was because all the dirt sticks to it. I tried 3 different methods to get that residue off and no luck. Boo.
customer_reviews.author: KS

customer_reviews.title: Pretty in Pink!
customer_reviews.text: The color is gorgeous. Super lightweight. Rolls super easy. The inside with polka dots was an adorable touch. The lock was in the inside pocket. The only negative for me, was the large suitcase had a small gash in it. Since the plastic it came in was fine, they packaged it and sent it out already damaged. It is small however and not worth sending back to get a new one. It still works fine.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon mahan

customer_reviews.title: Cracked after one use.
customer_reviews.text: I have these in two sizes. I think the carry-on size will be fine for its purpose, and I’ve had no issues so far. However, the larger one cracked the very first time I checked it. Beyond disappointed that it only lasted one use and am now reading that the warranty requires me to send them $40 for shipping and handling to assess it for a defect. The suitcase is not worth that expense and I’m pretty confident they would blame the airline. I realize it was a good price but cracking after one trip is ridiculous. Luggage should be built to withstand airline trauma and clearly this one wasn’t.
customer_reviews.author: S. Stratton

product_meta.title: Rockland Melbourne Hardside Expandable Spinner Wheel Luggage, Green, 2-Piece Set (20/28)
product_meta.description: Size:2-Piece Set (20/28)| Color:GreenThis 2 pc. set is made of ABS. This material is extremely lightweight, durable, and protects the contents of your luggage. Multi-directional double spinner wheels rotate 360 degrees for easy maneuverability. This luggage allows you to pack more while avoiding the excess weight surcharges imposed by most airlines. Expandable Multi-directional spinner wheels for easy maneuverability Modern internal chrome telescoping handle with push button handle. Interior mesh and zip pocket and elastic pocket *5 year * 22"x 13"x 9" (with wheels) weighs 6 lbs, 28"x17"x12" weighs 10 lbs.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars10,934 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
